Name: OneScreen Solar Sails
About the game: Arcade multiplayer for gatherings. Free for All, Team Game, Football, Capture the flag mods. Party game! Up to 8 players on one screen! Only three buttons game - turn left, turn right and fire! Shops - you'll not lose anything at death. Buy more solar sails, canon, drill power, armor, ship's durability, cannons range... PowerUps - temporary gain speed, drill power, cannon's range, power, piercing and frost powerups. Meteorites drill to destroy, pickup to collect, get it to shops to get more credits. Islands, clouds, shores, open sea settings
